<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: Make two separate allocations in the future to reduce</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// fragmentation: finalization segments will usually be a single page, and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
